kubernetes_add_node_pool_description: You can configure one or more node pools as soon as the cluster is created. A node pool refers to a set of worker nodes that share the same type.
kube_add_billing_type_description: You can switch from hourly billing to monthly billing for each node in the node pool edit view.
kube_common_node_pool_configure_false: Create a cluster without a node pool
kube_common_node_pool_estimated_cost: Estimated monthly cost of the cluster:
kube_common_node_pool_estimation_text: This estimate does not include a potential Savings Plan discount.
kube_common_node_pool_estimation_text_en: The exact cost depends on the actual resource usage, which cannot be accurately estimated before a cluster is created.
